name: King of Crypto
description:
King of Crypto is probably the only Idle Cryptocurrency Clicker that will keep you happily tapping for years.

Start by tapping the cheapest coin, Cheapcoin, and once you've accumulated enough cash, upgrade and your profits will be significantly increased for every tap. Bots will automatically tap for you while you're away. You'll be able to afford new coins in a matter of no time.

The only thing stopping you from a Vigintillion is... YOU!

• Bots - They'll do the taps for you
• Lots of coins - Buy them, Tap them, Upgrade them
• Boosts - earn larger profits
• Skips - Time travel into the future motherload of money
• Daily Spin - Free chance to earn keys
• Tasks - Rewarding targets with profit (why not?)
• Trade - Will you choose the right time to sell up?

Happy Tapping!
